name: spud-wiki-engine
description: Wiki Engine for the Spud Wiki.

scripts.build: node src/index.js validate && node src/index.js build && rollup --c --failAfterWarnings --no-stdin && cleancss -O2 specialComments:1 -o ./build/dist/assets/style.css ./src/assets/style.css
scripts.build:dev: node src/index.js validate && node src/index.js build:dev && rollup --c --failAfterWarnings --no-stdin --config_debug && cleancss -O0 -o ./build/dist/assets/style.css ./src/assets/style.css

author: SpikyTater, et al.
